mapper.update:
UPDATE delivery_user SET
name = #{name} ,
phone_number = #{phoneNumber} ,
login_name = #{loginName} ,
password = #{password} ,
equip_no = #{equipNo} ,
idcard_no = #{idcardNo} ,
address = #{address} ,
remark = #{remark} ,
account_status = #{accountStatus} ,
work_status = #{workStatus} ,
frozen_reason = #{frozenReason} ,
create_time = #{createTime} ,
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
